engineering_design_principles.mechanism: This principle allows for extreme structures with infinite values in key parameters such as density and gravity, leading to a breakdown in traditional geometric frameworks and spacetime.

engineering_design_principles.description: Highlighting limits of existing mathematical and engineering models
engineering_design_principles.mechanism: This principle showcases the inadequacies of current mathematical and engineering models by providing insights into the behavior of matter and energy under exceptional conditions, where traditional rules are no longer applicable.
